item.description:
The first ever Plone sprint in Boston is going to be happening July 18-23, 2007 at the Christian Science Center (where we hold the monthly Boston Plone meetups). At the meeting on thursday, we will discuss the sprint topics and plan the logistics to make sure it's a smooth experience for everyone who participates. Bring your ideas and enthusiasm! If there's time, we will also get a sneak peek at Plone 3.0 which was just released as beta 3 a few days ago.

Read more about the upcoming sprint on the Plone4Artists / Multimedia Sprint in Boston page.

We will also discuss the Zope 3 Training for Plone Developers that will be happening in the two days prior to the sprint.

If your interested in knowing what what's the latest and greatest in the Plone world, this meetup is for you.

For more information, see http://www.bostonplon...

Please note that this meetup is not at the usual location, but at the Nature Conservancy near the Chinatown and Downtown Crossing T stops.
item.name: The Boston Plone May Meetup
